articles.description: No one should lose their job this way, says actor Summer Strallen
articles.content:
OpinionMy role as the Queen in this West End musical would have paid my bills for a year. No one should lose their job this way
Last Thursday, I was having a wig fitting for the role of the Queen in… [+4864 chars]
